title: Ticket #1150: Long term monitor nightly tests
description:
We'll keen an eye on the nightly tests for a few weeks, particularly looking for patterns in the erratic failures. How common are they? Is there a subset of tests that are problematic? This will give us some guidance for how best to fix them. Perhaps there are just a few we can fix individually, or perhaps it's a pervasive problem that requires a higher level fix.

Dan is doing the initial week of monitoring.
